objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver Authentic
• Elegant Pink Drop Design

• 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and feminine aesthetic designed to promote rose gold stud earrings. The layout is diagonally split using a gradient background that transitions from deep rose brown (#8B3A3A) to a soft pink (#FFD1DC), with sparkles and elegant line motifs enhancing the luxurious feel. At the top left, large bold white text ("heading_1" and "heading_2") delivers the main message, followed by a smaller elegant serif subtitle ("subheading"). Below that, a description list ("description") gives product highlights. The "tagline" adds a heartfelt sentiment in a soft tone. The "price" is displayed in bold and bright white for emphasis. A gentle rounded CTA button ("cta_background") with the label ("cta") invites action. To the right, the "product_image" features the earrings, elegantly centered on the pink section.  

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Rose Brown: #8B3A3A  
- Soft Mauve: #A06666  
- Light Pink: #FFD1DC  
- Pale Pink: #FADADD  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Cream White: #FFF5EE
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings blending a soft, feminine color palette with luxurious shine. The primary hues include rose gold (#F4A6A6), used for the metal framework and accenting, and crystal white (#FFFFFF) with subtle icy blue (#E6F0FA) tones for the gemstones. The blush pink (#F7CAC9) teardrop detail adds warmth and sophistication. Colors are used to create visual harmony; the rose gold outline contrasts with the brilliance of the stones while softly blending with the pink centerpiece, drawing attention to the form. This refined palette enhances the delicacy and elegance of the jewelry, perfect for romantic or luxury-themed banners.
